sentences.english: I will do is the ability tasty Egg Fried Rice.
sentences.chinese: 我的本领就是会做香喷喷的蛋炒饭。

sentences.english: Every one of these scrumptious pastries is an exchange of love between the bakers and their young recipients.
sentences.chinese: 每一个香喷喷的面包都是烘焙者与受赠者的爱的交流。

sentences.english: All of the above plus smoked chicken.
sentences.chinese: 凯萨沙拉的一切加上香喷喷的熏鸡肉。

sentences.english: Day air-cooled, fragrant roasts the sweet potato depth the Hefei resident's affection.
sentences.chinese: 天气凉了，香喷喷的烤红薯深受合肥市民的喜爱。

sentences.english: We can have some tasty rice now.
sentences.chinese: 这下就能吃到香喷喷的米饭了。

sentences.english: I said, as I smelled the delicious scent.
sentences.chinese: 我说，因为我已经问到了香喷喷的味道。

sentences.english: We can eat the delicious corns every day.
sentences.chinese: 我们每天可以吃到香喷喷的玉米棒。
